carouselList.ms1: I share stories about #NM, #superNM, #bigNM and #superBigNM on the Internet.
carouselList.ms3: There are countless ways to tell a story about the world, this is mine.
carouselList.ms4: Storytelling is my passion because I've been profoundly shaped by the stories of others.

video.title: Game related Video Essay Creato
video.description: I'm not only playing games. I treat video games as an experiment. Through games, I study behavioral psychology, product design, decision making, and aesthetics.
video.topicsTitle: Topics I touched or planed to touch:
